execution_quality: Clean and efficient execution—the agent completed the assigned review task, documented findings across four specifications with quantified issue counts, and properly signaled completion. However, no substantive work artifacts (detailed findings) were directly committed or returned in this interaction.
work_category: Async task completion reporting from a teammate agent reviewing specification documents. The agent updated task status and reported findings from a multi-document review engagement.
summary: The teammate agent successfully completed an assigned specification review task, identifying 41 total issues across four documents with proper severity classification. The agent communicated findings clearly, properly updated task status via TaskUpdate, and proactively offered availability for follow-up work—demonstrating high autonomy and perfect alignment with the async work delegation model.
follow_up_pattern: Task completion milestone reached with actionable next step offered ('Ready for additional tasks if available'). User would typically assign new review tasks or pivot to addressing the identified issues.
